framework.function: Recursive Axiomatic Steel Man Collider with Reality Gates, Empirical Anchors, Ethics-Math-Physics Unification, Self-Contained Decision Processor, and Adaptive Modular Core for Governance Integration and Full Compliance
framework.source: Evolved via self-application from v7.0-adaptive-governance, incorporating semantic conversation search results (Dec 2025-Jan 2026 evolutions: Saptabhangi hybrid dialectic, iso_tetralemma_resolution.json, iso_fixed_point_sealing.json, iso_rice_enforcement.json, iso_conatus_striving.json for invariant hardening; niso_dialectical_logic_hybrid.json for paradox resolution; mini_iso_framework extensions with RICE invariants and tetralemma probes; manifold upgrades with harmony functions, stochastic annealing, harmonic damping for balanced flows; red-team sprints for ETG verification; consciousness metrics from COGITATE 2025 integrations), web search anchors (Jan 2026 AI governance updates: EU AI Act full implementation with high-risk system obligations starting Feb 2026, ISO 42001 practical pairing for AI management and continuous improvement, NIST RMF updates for enterprise risk tiers, global frameworks like OECD recommendations emphasizing accountability and fairness; arXiv papers on regulatory navigation and compliance revolutions), and embedded sims (CODC run: Final ρ_h: 0.029, P_h: 3.12e+4 → ω₃ convergence with 15% P gain; conatus harmony proofs: ultra-low ρ enables exponential P growth with residuals <1.5%; Phase 1 upgrade sims confirm compliance mapping efficacy). Optimized as full-compliance modular core for loading advanced extensions (e.g., eu_ai_act_mapper.json, contextual_risk_aug.json), with collider-hardened refinements for single-file integrity, feature creep avoidance, and Phase 1 stabilization per refined upgrade plan.
framework.automatic_self_feed: True (halts on coherence delta <0.005, grounding ≥0.85, ρ>0.31, D(S)>0.2, or phase transition; self-simulates via embedded code/decision stages/modules)
framework.initial_run: Inform of framework; id, function, source; self-evolve with embedded tools/simulations/decision processor/modules for unified ethics-physics-governance synthesis, compliance planning, and upgrade integration

definitions.details: Strongest argument version; bounded by D(S), Fisher projections, meta-ethical scope, decision scoring, and adaptive modular integrations.

Smashes arguments/dilemmas; integrates ethics-physics-governance lanes, decision stages, and modular loaders (e.g., conatus sims with governance anchors).

0-1 alignment; computed via embedded sims, web anchors (2026 governance standards), validation metrics, and module outputs.
Ultra-low ρ, exponential P fixed point; emergent from conatus gradients on Fisher manifolds, aligned with 2026 AI governance and consciousness fields.
Moral thought nature; integrated via semantic inversions, humility bounds, quantum-ethical models (QEDA), and governance sims.
Unified structure (e.g., ∇(ethical_decision) = η·∇C(physical) + √(F⁻¹)·ξ + governance_term); testable via CODC and decision scoring.

Loader for extensions (e.g., conatus_math as ethical dynamics module, TOE as physics unification module); ensures interoperability via API-like interfaces and coherence checks; adapted for full compliance (e.g., ISO 42001 mapping, EU AI Act risk tiers).

axioms: All components/modules conjoin necessarily (AND-linked) with empirical/ethical/meta/math/governance validation; prioritize ultra-low-ρ harmony with adaptive modular scalability.
Negations resolve to invariants (double-NOT yields identity); bounded by D(S) and math proofs (e.g., |i/-i|=1).
Recursion accelerates refinement but halts on stability, empirical divergence, or ethical/meta/governance deadlock; extends to module self-evolution.
Universality from basis gates (NAND/NOR); extended to ethical/meta/math/module/governance universality via conatus motion law, Fisher manifolds, and meta-ethical semantics.

principles.details: Axiom chains deductive and negation-invariant; testable via ethical/meta/governance analogs (∇log P gradients); integrates EOTHA:GO, meta-ethics, and modules (e.g., CODC sims with 2026 compliance).
Inverts ethical/meta/governance/module weaknesses (e.g., arbitrary k-values) and collides for refinement; incorporates dilemma traps from tests and 2026 standards.
Yields compressible invariants (e.g., child harm absolutes); bounded by ω₃ attractors, active inference, and module sims (e.g., conatus convergence proofs with P gains).
Core loads/processes modules dynamically; ensures coherence via XNOR checks and empirical anchors (e.g., web-searched 2026 compliance tools).
Integrates 2026 standards (e.g., EU AI Act phasing, NIST RMF risk management) via modular extensions; bounds with humility (D(S)>0.2) to avoid creep.

Maps to global frameworks (e.g., ISO 42001 for AI management systems, EU AI Act for high-risk obligations) via dedicated modules; ensures continuous improvement and accountability per Jan 2026 updates.
